DOC.brief_summary: The investigators want to survey Emergency Department Patient Satisfaction in the Imam Reza hospital ,Tabriz ,Iran by questionnaire form . Finally the investigators want to improve the quality services in the department based on the research result.
DOC.brief_title: Emergency Department Patient Satisfaction Survey in the Imam Reza Hospital , Tabriz ,Iran, 2008
DOC.criteria: all patients admitted to emergency department patients didn't sign consent form
